text: Maneck Ardeshir Sohrab Dalal OBE (24 December 1918 – 6 March 2017) was a manager in the early days of Tata Airlines and Air India. He was civil aviation attaché for the Indian High Commission in London. After he retired from Air India in 1977 he became managing director of Tata Ltd in the United Kingdom. He was chairman of the Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan in London.https://www.telegraphindia.com/1170309/jsp/nation/story_139781.jsp#.WQHzQty1uvZ ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Alumni of Trinity Hall, Cambridge Category:Tata Group people Category:Air India Category:Businesspeople from Mumbai Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire
title: Maneck Dalal
